Flow.description: Created as part of SFS-1321 Updated as a part of SFS-3033 Updated as a part of SFS-4087,4088,4089,4490 Updated as part of SFS-4978 Updated as a part of SFS-4980 Updated as a part of SFS-5313 Updated for file auto-renaming, SFS-6639 Updated for SFS-6573, max instance check Updated as part of SFS-7279 Updated as a part of SFS-7438 Updated as a part of SFS-6196 Updated as a part of SFI-2967(SIT bug) Updated as a part of SFS-7949 Updated as a part of SFS-7916 Updated as part of SFS-8068 Updated as a part of SFS-7949 Updated as a part of SFL-342 Updated as part of SFL-755 Updated as aprt of SFL-1111
Flow.label: DCF Meter Details

validationRule.errorMessage: RSN should be within 10 digits.

fields.name: CompleteMeterDetailsMessage
fields.fieldText: To complete the Meter Details, please click on 'Meter Details' action.

screens.name: Error_Screen_for_not_today_date
screens.label: Error Screen for not today date

validationRule.errorMessage: House Number should be within 5 digits.
House Name should be within 80 characters.
Street should be within 80 characters.
City should be within 80 characters.
Post Code should be within 9 characters.

fields.name: FinalDisplayScreen
fields.fieldText: This is the final screen, clicking Next will exit the form.

validationRule.errorMessage: Grid Reference X should be between 240000 and 550000
Grid Reference Y should be between 170000 and 440000

fields.name: Display_Text_For_Meter_Location
fields.fieldText: This should be the actual location of the meter not address

fields.name: Meter_Location2
fields.helpText: This should be the actual location of the meter not address

validationRule.errorMessage: Meter location should be within 200 characters.

fields.name: FinalScreenDisplayText
fields.fieldText: This is the final screen , clicking Next will exit the form.

fields.name: DtextForNewMeterPhoto
fields.fieldText: Please take photo of top of meter to clearly capture serial number and meter reading.

validationRule.errorMessage: Meter Serial No. should be within 12 characters.
Initial Meter Reading should be within 18 digits.

fields.name: DtextExistingMeter
fields.fieldText: Please take photo of top of meter to clearly capture serial number and meter reading.

validationRule.errorMessage: Meter Serial Number should be within 80 characters.

fields.name: If_no_meter_installed_provide_reasons_as_to_why_not
fields.fieldText: If no meter installed, provide reasons as to why not

validationRule.errorMessage: RSN should be within 10 characters.

fields.name: Emessage
fields.fieldText: One or more mandatory files are missing. Please check and add them all before continuing.

fields.name: Errmessage
fields.fieldText: One or more mandatory files are missing. Please check and add them all before continuing.

fields.name: WOErrorMessage
fields.fieldText: Error! Work Order Not found

fields.name: WorkStep_is_already_Completed_Do_you_still_want_to_fill_the_form_again
fields.fieldText: WorkStep is already Completed . Do you still want to fill the form again ?
